alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:04PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN HARRISON, NORTHERN HANCOCK AND SOUTHEASTERN PEARL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 404 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Mcneil, or 16 miles southeast of Poplarville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamondhead and Kiln. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Pearl River; Southern Hancock
